News.Title: US Shifts Defense Focus to China, Reduces Allied Support
News.Summary: Pentagon's 2026 National Defense Strategy prioritizes homeland defense and China deterrence while providing limited support to allies. Document marks departure from Biden-era policies with softer tone on China and Russia.

News.Title: Pentagon Integrates Musk's Grok AI for Military Use
News.Summary: US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth announces Pentagon will integrate Elon Musk's Grok AI alongside Google's generative AI for military operations, emphasizing innovation without ideological constraints.

News.Title: Pentagon Adopts Musk's Grok AI Despite Global Concerns
News.Summary: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth announces Grok AI integration into Pentagon networks this month, despite recent global outcry over deepfake image generation and content controversies.
